title: ESTA (Electronic System for Travel Authorization) approvals
dataVerified: Full name, passport number, nationality, DOB, travel details, approval number
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents fake ESTA approvals. Domain binding verifies DHS/CBP (cbp.gov). Required for VWP travel to USA. Printable approval confirmation. Airline verification at check-in. Border crossing documentation. For privacy, issuers can add a random salt line to raise entropy and defeat guessing attacks.
